html:
11.19.21  1:55 am   Have you noticed instances of "remastered" versions of older (pre digital recording) music and the remastered versions sound bad?

     yes

     Cause I have.

11.19.21  12:42 am   any thoughts on colonizing mars?

      harder than previous colonizations, due to being uninhabitable, but also less confrontational because no one was there before

11.18.21  11:58 pm   would you think that being a better person or a different person as the way to go

      sometimes you can be both. if the previous person was bad

11.18.21  9:15 pm   are you still the illuminati president 666 confirmed?

      fake

11.18.21  7:25 pm   Is belief action

      something tells me you are thinking of a context in which they are both the same, but without knowing that context, i have to say that they are certainly different concepts, which may or may not coexist together sometimes

11.18.21  5:31 pm   do you ever not understand urself 

      yes

11.18.21  7:33 pm   how much time does it take to make a music vid

      exactly the wrong amount

11.18.21  7:16 pm   What is the bpm of the next song?

      116

11.18.21  7:00 pm   what's the difference between arts and crafts? 

      crafts would include something non-artistic and practical, like building a canoe

11.18.21  5:52 pm   What's a good name for my new pet rock?

      the same name as you. this will allow you to reflect

11.18.21  5:32 pm   how to do projects with groups better? i always end up both contributing too much & too little somehow

      this is not my strong skill

11.18.21  12:22 pm   do you enjoy feeling sad sometimes, after it happens? I kind of do, just because it adds a bit of variety in my life.

      it almost seems like good feelings only exist in comparison to less good feelings

11.18.21  1:32 pm   do you watch grass grow in your spare time

      no

11.18.21  1:30 pm   have you ever wanted to create a country named after you

      no

11.18.21  11:58 am   how do i find talent?

      it's you

11.18.21  11:11 am   is music getting better or worse in your opinion

      better

11.18.21  10:24 am   whats ur favorite seasoning

      reasoning

11.18.21  9:15 am   is dream on your next song?

      no

11.18.21  8:46 am   Opinions on transforming every single song in existence to giant steps?

      that could be a good community service

11.18.21  8:35 am   have you ever feuded with another family with your family while families watch you on tv on family feud?

      no

11.18.21  8:15 am   Why are there two different ways to describe the black keys (sharps and flats)?

      so you can always use the same letter as the note you were substituting it for. keep the alphabet going without any hiccups

11.18.21  7:15 am   What is the main ingredient of Chicken McNuggets?

      McLovin

11.18.21  4:34 am   is music the silence between the notes or the notes between the silence 

      the interplay between both

11.18.21  1:37 am   i am eternal

      i believe you

11.17.21  11:36 pm   Should I keep going

      where

11.17.21  10:57 pm   how to be successful?

      nobody knows

11.17.21  10:04 pm   Why was your song "got to know what's going on" not turned into a music video on your channel?

      this is to allow "hi, i'm steve" and every other video after that, to be released about 4 weeks earlier than they otherwise would have

11.17.21  9:45 pm   Who are the best notes to play

      the best results come from how you change notes. more specifically, it's how you change between changing notes and staying on the same notes

11.17.21  9:43 pm   thoughts on memes?

      the ultimate love child of religion and science

11.17.21  9:19 pm   What are you working on right now?

      a song

11.17.21  9:13 pm   whats the one step in the one step process

      step

11.17.21  7:58 pm   thoughts on my desk

      it's good

11.17.21  6:36 pm   Does your next song have a chorus section? 

      yes

11.17.21  4:47 pm   name a random location i can go to and film im desperate

      reykjavik

11.17.21  4:30 pm   what is a good day

      it's hard to describe

11.17.21  4:14 pm   Is there a difference between music you want to hear and music you want to make?

      i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no

11.17.21  4:10 pm   Are you going on tour

      i'll see if i can work that out

11.17.21  2:39 pm   Do you always focus just on the music while listening to music?

      no

11.17.21  1:18 pm   tell me if I'm being too conspiratorial but are all your songs made by the same person

      yes

11.17.21  10:25 am   do you refuse to eat the planet Neptune 

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.17.21  9:43 am   If you were to write a song anywhere on earth, where would you write it?

     how about writing it while traveling from one place to another

     Where would you NOT write it?

     inside the earth's core, as fun as that sounds

11.17.21  7:00 am   Congratulations! Your song "slow down" is stuck in my head.




⁽ᵂᵃˢ ᵗʰᶦˢ ʸᵒᵘʳ ᵖˡᵃⁿ ᵃˡˡ ᵃˡᵒⁿᵍˀ⁾

      yes

11.17.21  6:09 am   your vocal drag on "getting a good night's sleep" seems to imply you may... in actuality be aspiring to have a good night's sleep instead of 100% having it, no?

      that was just something i did every time when listening to the writing playbacks. i couldn't imagine that line without it

11.17.21  5:43 am   should i ask the experts?

      sure..... if you can figure out who the experts are

11.17.21  12:43 am   can I be P R I N C E S S ? !

      sure

11.16.21  11:40 pm   thoughts on saxophones?

      they are like Telephones but a slightly different shape

11.16.21  11:06 pm   can i go my own way?

      yes

11.16.21  11:00 pm   Why are the five steps to writing a song

      write the first 20%, then write the next 20%, then write the next 20%, then write the next 20%, then write the next 20%

11.16.21  10:59 pm   What do you think about pineapples?

      i don't usually think about pineapples unless i am in the mood to be totally confused and bewildered

11.16.21  10:08 pm   did you try all of the states to make sure pennsylvania was the best one to fit new canaan?

     no. i didn't try any. just came up with the line as it is. it surprised me, because it's the wrong state. the town is in connecticut. but, you can't argue with music

     mississippi and california and west virginia definitely don't have the right vibe, but what about massachusetts?

     never considered it. if i was thinking logically about it, it would have been connecticut, and the whole thing would have been different
